replies.body: Basically there are two ways to butterfly click, most people do it the incorrect way, which they get no vibrations with and the hammer motion of the second tap gives extra, illegitimate clicks due to a bug on most mice. Though most people don't know the proper way, which gives you vibrations and gets you more clicks, legitimately. Due to this bug it is largely considered cheating and banable on servers such as Badlion and OCN from my understanding. Most anti-cheats pick up the improper butterfly as autoclicker.
replies.body_tagged: Basically there are two ways to butterfly click, most people do it the incorrect way, which they get no vibrations with and the hammer motion of the second tap gives extra, illegitimate clicks due to a bug on most mice. Though most people don't know the proper way, which gives you vibrations and gets you more clicks, legitimately. Due to this bug it is largely considered cheating and banable on servers such as Badlion and OCN from my understanding. Most anti-cheats pick up the improper butterfly as autoclicker.

replies.body:
I only use it for placing blocks fast.

I'm sure I'll get banned for auto clicking by G Cheat on Badlion though, or even OCN or here, if I'm on an alt.

I've been practicing it with normal clicking and my aim is bad af. I get around 10 cps compared to my 5 normally clicking, and when i get someone in a combo, it's pretty damn over powered. It's kind of like when you put an extremely low sensitivity on and jitterclick, only with your normal sensitivity. Unsurprisingly, the best mouse for illegitimate butterfly clicking, is the DeathAdder. Not only it has big buttons, but the clicks are incredibly light. I have it, and it's a lot easier than a normal mouse.

It's kind of like when you put an extremely low sensitivity on and jitterclick, only with your normal sensitivity. Unsurprisingly, the best mouse for illegitimate butterfly clicking, is the DeathAdder. Not only it has big buttons, but the clicks are incredibly light. I have it, and it's a lot easier than a normal mouse.

replies.body:
Exactly.

That's why it's hard to know if someone is jittering/butterflying or autoclicking.

You'd assume an alt with 40 kills placing 3 blocks above the ground while block spamming is autoclicking. You check if he's a regular on OCN, Kohi or even Badlion, and he hasn't, or has rarely, played on those servers. Instead of going through the trouble of contacting a Senior Mod, the usual Avicus staff member, at least a couple of months ago, bans the player for autoclicking. That's what happened to Splade. You probably already know this, but a lot of people don't.

replies.body:
1. Any type of third party program that interfaces(directly or indirectly) with the minecraft client to provide an unfair advantage is strictly prohibited. Examples include(but not limited to) autoclickers, macros, multiple attack buttons (multiple buttons bound to mouse1), editing hardware to allow clicking faster than humanly possible (drag clicking), and changing default mouse interactions (like double/triple click on a single click). General rule is one button, one finger, one click.
General rule is one button, one finger, one click.

Butterfly clicking is not that, therefore they ban for it.. Ask Hughsie and check the badlion forums...
replies.body_tagged:
1. Any type of third party program that interfaces(directly or indirectly) with the minecraft client to provide an unfair advantage is strictly prohibited. Examples include(but not limited to) autoclickers, macros, multiple attack buttons (multiple buttons bound to mouse1), editing hardware to allow clicking faster than humanly possible (drag clicking), and changing default mouse interactions (like double/triple click on a single click). General rule is one button, one finger, one click.
General rule is one button, one finger, one click.

Butterfly clicking is not that, therefore they ban for it.. Ask Hughsie and check the badlion forums...

replies.body: Butterfly clicking is cheating as it adds extra clicks that <u>you did not do.</u> The way servers like Badlion and Kohi pick it up is by using their respective GCheat and AntiSkid, <u>not by moderators watching them.</u> If it's allowed here, whatever but let it be known that it is the equivalent of a Razer Synapse autoclicker.
